title: Long-trained nightjar
text:
The long-trained nightjar (Macropsalis forcipata) is a species of nightjar in the family Caprimulgidae. It is monotypic within the genus Macropsalis.
It is found in forests, mainly in highlands, in south-eastern Brazil and far north-eastern Argentina.


== References ==
